comment: He hates technology. Just leave your phone in the car. Not available outside of class. Group project is time consuming and complicated. Heavily repeated lectures on basic accounting. In a fully sarcastic sense: Woohoooooo! best teacher ever *pumps arm once."
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Don't really know where to start... lecture lasts the whole 2 hours and 45 mins. 7 page research paper at the beginning, 4 specific quizzes, 2 field trips followed by 2 four page research paper due the next week, and 2 dinners followed by 2 more papers due the week after assigned. Also a partner project and group project w/ paper at the end. Insane
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS
